title: Anker SoundCore 24-Hour Playtime Bluetooth Speaker with 10W Limited Output, Stereo Sound, Rich Bass, 66-foot Bluetooth Range, Built-in Mic. Portable Wireless Speaker for iPhone, Samsung, and More
feature_list: Astonishing Sound: Breathtaking stereo sound with deep bass is delivered with exceptional clarity and zero distortion by two high-sensitivity drivers and a patented bass port.
24H Worry-Free Battery Life: Anker's exclusive, long-life battery technology provides 24 hours of sublime music.
Effortless Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.2 ensures instant pairing and maintains a rock-solid connection for flawless streaming.
Designed to Play: Combines a solid, drop-proof build with tactile materials and seamless controls.
Grab, Go, Listen: Lightweight, yet robust unibody design provides the perfect soundtrack for the park, yard, or anywhere else at home or away.
